title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1770
medium:
Medium: silk, paper
Technique: embroidered on uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet); in paper envelope
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Dark brown ground with a light brown vermicular pattern embroidered in a border design of naturalistic flowers in shades of rose, green, yellow and white.

ca. 1770. Medium: silk, paper
